languages.text: "Рассуждения о судьбах напоминают мне один еретический культ, с недавних пор изводящий владения фон Валанциус... Твои видения, скульптор, нашептаны варпом". {n}Хейнрикс сверлит старика недобрым взглядом.{/n}

"These musings on destinies and fates remind me of a heretical cult that has been plaguing the von Valancius domain of late... Your visions, sculptor, are whispers of the warp." {n}Heinrix glares ominously at the old man.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Рассуждения о судьбах напоминают мне один еретический культ, с недавних пор изводящий владения фон Валанциус... Твои видения, скульптор, нашептаны варпом". {n}Хейнрикс сверлит старика недобрым взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "These musings on destinies and fates remind me of a heretical cult that has been plaguing the von Valancius domain of late... Your visions, sculptor, are whispers of the warp." {n}Heinrix glares ominously at the old man.{/n}

"These musings on destinies and fates remind me of a heretical cult that has been plaguing the von Valancius domain of late... Your visions, sculptor, are whispers of the warp." {n}Heinrix glares ominously at the old man.{/n}

"These musings on destinies and fates remind me of a heretical cult that has been plaguing the von Valancius domain of late... Your visions, sculptor, are whispers of the warp." {n}Heinrix glares ominously at the old man.{/n}

"These musings on destinies and fates remind me of a heretical cult that has been plaguing the von Valancius domain of late... Your visions, sculptor, are whispers of the warp." {n}Heinrix glares ominously at the old man.{/n}

"These musings on destinies and fates remind me of a heretical cult that has been plaguing the von Valancius domain of late... Your visions, sculptor, are whispers of the warp." {n}Heinrix glares ominously at the old man.{/n}

"These musings on destinies and fates remind me of a heretical cult that has been plaguing the von Valancius domain of late... Your visions, sculptor, are whispers of the warp." {n}Heinrix glares ominously at the old man.{/n}

languages.text: "Diese Gedanken über das Schicksal erinnern mich an einen Ketzerkult, der in letzter Zeit das Reich Valancius heimsucht ... Eure Visionen, Skulpteur, sind ein Flüstern des Warp." {n}Heinrix blickt den alten Mann bedrohlich an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "These musings on destinies and fates remind me of a heretical cult that has been plaguing the von Valancius domain of late... Your visions, sculptor, are whispers of the warp." {n}Heinrix glares ominously at the old man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese Gedanken über das Schicksal erinnern mich an einen Ketzerkult, der in letzter Zeit das Reich Valancius heimsucht ... Eure Visionen, Skulpteur, sind ein Flüstern des Warp." {n}Heinrix blickt den alten Mann bedrohlich an.

languages.text: « Ces réflexions sur le destin me rappellent une certaine secte hérétique qui sévit dans le domaine des von Valancius ces derniers temps... Vos visions, sculpteur, sont des murmures du Warp, » {n}déclare Heinrix en lançant un regard menaçant au vieil homme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "These musings on destinies and fates remind me of a heretical cult that has been plaguing the von Valancius domain of late... Your visions, sculptor, are whispers of the warp." {n}Heinrix glares ominously at the old man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ces réflexions sur le destin me rappellent une certaine secte hérétique qui sévit dans le domaine des von Valancius ces derniers temps... Vos visions, sculpteur, sont des murmures du Warp, » {n}déclare Heinrix en lançant un regard menaçant au vieil homme.{/n}

languages.text: “这些关于命运的思考，不禁让我联想到冯·瓦兰修斯王朝领地最近盛行的某种异端崇拜……雕刻师，你看到的景象是亚空间的低语。”{n}海因里希瞪着这个老人，目光中流露着不祥的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: "These musings on destinies and fates remind me of a heretical cult that has been plaguing the von Valancius domain of late... Your visions, sculptor, are whispers of the warp." {n}Heinrix glares ominously at the old man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这些关于命运的思考，不禁让我联想到冯·瓦兰修斯王朝领地最近盛行的某种异端崇拜……雕刻师，你看到的景象是亚空间的低语。”{n}海因里希瞪着这个老人，目光中流露着不祥的意味。{/n}

languages.text: «Estas reflexiones sobre los destinos me recuerdan a un culto hereje que ha estado proliferando últimamente por el dominio von Valancius... Tus visiones, escultor, son susurros de la disformidad». {n}Heinrix lanza una mirada siniestra al anciano.{/n}
languages.original_text: "These musings on destinies and fates remind me of a heretical cult that has been plaguing the von Valancius domain of late... Your visions, sculptor, are whispers of the warp." {n}Heinrix glares ominously at the old man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Estas reflexiones sobre los destinos me recuerdan a un culto hereje que ha estado proliferando últimamente por el dominio von Valancius... Tus visiones, escultor, son susurros de la disformidad». {n}Heinrix lanza una mirada siniestra al anciano.{/n}

languages.text: 「運命や宿命についてのこの考察は、近頃フォン・ヴァランシウス領に広まっている異端のカルトを思い起こさせるな…彫刻家よ、お前のビジョンは〈歪み〉の囁きに他ならない」{n}ハインリックスは老人を威圧するようににらみつけた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "These musings on destinies and fates remind me of a heretical cult that has been plaguing the von Valancius domain of late... Your visions, sculptor, are whispers of the warp." {n}Heinrix glares ominously at the old man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「運命や宿命についてのこの考察は、近頃フォン・ヴァランシウス領に広まっている異端のカルトを思い起こさせるな…彫刻家よ、お前のビジョンは〈歪み〉の囁きに他ならない」{n}ハインリックスは老人を威圧するようににらみつけた。{/n}

languages.text: "Bu kader ve mukadderat teemmülleri, von Valancius diyarına musallat olan kâfir bir tarikatı hatırlatıyor. Heykeltıraş, senin o görülerin esasında öteboyutun fısıltılarıdır." {n}Heinrix, ihtiyara kasvetli bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "These musings on destinies and fates remind me of a heretical cult that has been plaguing the von Valancius domain of late... Your visions, sculptor, are whispers of the warp." {n}Heinrix glares ominously at the old man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu kader ve mukadderat teemmülleri, von Valancius diyarına musallat olan kâfir bir tarikatı hatırlatıyor. Heykeltıraş, senin o görülerin esasında öteboyutun fısıltılarıdır." {n}Heinrix, ihtiyara kasvetli bir bakış atar.{/n}
